class mkconfig.core.chain.ChainOfTransfiguration[source]¶

A chain of responsibility implementation that channel through a series of transifgurations. One may depend on previous step with respect to Context

add(transfiguration)[source]¶

Add a transfiguration into the chain of execution.

Parameters:transfiguration – a transfiguration to be added
execute(context=None)[source]¶

Perform execution of transfiguration one-by-one in the chain

Parameters:context – a map of key-value attributes to perform
get(index)[source]¶

Retrieve a transifguration in the chain at position [index]

Parameters:index – index from 0 to size-of-chain
Returns:the transfiguration at chain[index]
size()[source]¶

Retrieve the # of transigurations in chain.

Returns:length of chain
class mkconfig.core.cli.CliController(*args, **kw)[source]¶

A Controller class to add arguments and linking commands with functions

class Meta[source]¶

Meta class that defines arguments.

arguments = [(['-s', '--apps_list'], {'metavar': 'STR', 'required': True, 'action': 'store', 'help': 'List of apps name'}), (['-d', '--app_conf_dir'], {'metavar': 'STR', 'required': True, 'action': 'store', 'default': './', 'help': 'Directory for app configuration'}), (['-t', '--template'], {'metavar': 'STR', 'default': 'collectd_jmx', 'action': 'store', 'help': 'Type of configuration template'}), (['-o', '--output'], {'metavar': 'File', 'required': True, 'action': 'store', 'help': 'Path to output file'})]¶
description = 'Make Configuration'¶
label = 'base'¶
CliController.default()[source]¶

A default command to execute. Internally, it will execute the chain of transfiguration that generates the configuration

class mkconfig.core.jinja2.Jinja2Engine[source]¶

A concret TemplateEngine implementation based on Jinja2 framework.

class Factory[source]¶

Inner Factory class to fulfill the binding from TemplateEngineFactory

static create()[source]¶

A factory method to create an associated Jinja2Engine instance

Returns:the associated Jinja2Engine object
Jinja2Engine.apply(context, template_name, output_file, is_in_memory=False)[source]¶

Apply the template with Jinja2 environment.

Parameters:
  • context – A map of key-value attribute defined variables to be applied with template
  • template_name – name of template to apply with
  • output_file – file name to the substitution result.
  • (bool) (isInMemory) – whether to perform templateing in-memory or in-file.
Jinja2Engine.init(init_loader)[source]¶

Initialize the Jinja2 environment

Parameters:init_loader – The template loader for Jinja2 environment

Apply the template with python string template engine.

Parameters:
  • context – A map of key-value attribute defined variables to be applied with template
  • output_file – file name to the substitution result.
  • (bool) (isInMemory) – whether to perform templateing in-memory or in-file.

Parameters:line – line of string containing templates
